page.title: 09GARDEN CENTRE/LILFORD PARK
page.content:
The greenhouses were part of the old kitchen garden, and the covered glass area of some 9000 sq.ft. now holds a wide range of pot plants, ceramics, silk flowers, bulbs, garden sundries and a range of conifers, heathers, trees and shrubs are also raised in the nurseries.
:-ROCK GARDEN/LILFORD PARK
These extensive gardens were originally laid out by the fifth Lady Mellicent Lilford at the begining of the 20th Century.
:-PINETUM/LILFORD PARK
This is separate from the garden centre but also has several species of pine, heather and small shrubs.
